info.name: GreenCup Seller - Web Routes Collection
info.description: Complete Postman collection for GreenCup Seller Panel based on actual Laravel web routes

response.name: Success - Login Form
response.body: <!DOCTYPE html><html><head><title>GreenCup Seller Login</title></head><body><form method="POST"><input name="email" /><input name="password" type="password" /></form></body></html>

response.name: Failed - Invalid Credentials
response.body: {"message": "The provided credentials do not match our records.", "errors": {"email": ["These credentials do not match our records."]}}

response.name: Success - Registration Form
response.body: <!DOCTYPE html><html><head><title>GreenCup Seller Registration</title></head><body><form method="POST"><input name="business_name" /><input name="email" /><input name="password" type="password" /></form></body></html>

response.name: Success
response.body: Your account is pending approval

response.name: Success
response.body: Your account has been suspended

response.name: Success
response.body: Your account application was rejected

response.name: Success
response.body: <!DOCTYPE html><html><head><title>Create Item</title></head><body><form method="POST"><input name="name" /><input name="category" /><input name="points" /></form></body></html>
